microsoftAi.card1Body: Simplify workflows and minimize errors with AI-powered automation that works seamlessly with your existing systems.

planSection.subtitle: Three Simple Steps to Transform Your Business with AI

step1.title: We Evaluate Your Business
step1.body: We analyze your processes, pain points, and opportunities where AI can generate real impact.

step2.title: We Implement Smart Solutions
step2.body: We design and integrate Microsoft tools — Copilot, Dynamics 365, Power Automate, Azure AI, and Fabric — tailored to your workflow.

step3.title: We Measure and Scale Results
step3.body: We monitor KPIs, optimize processes, and expand AI to other areas for sustainable value.

packagesSection.title: Choose Your Package
packagesSection.subtitle: Flexible solutions that scale with your business

card1.title: IT ADMINISTRATOR PACK
card1.subtitle: Comprehensive Microsoft 365 Management
card1.item1: Continuous monitoring of Microsoft 365, Azure, and Teams
card1.item2: Early alerts powered by predictive AI
card1.item4: Remote technical support and advanced administration
card1.idealFor: Companies seeking operational stability and technological efficiency without expanding their IT team.

card2.title: POWER PLATFORM PACK
card2.subtitle: Automate. Analyze. Improve.
card2.item1: Eliminate repetitive tasks and accelerate your processes with Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI — all powered by AI.
card2.item3: Full integration with Microsoft Teams and Dynamics 365
card2.idealFor: Turning your data into actions and your processes into opportunities.

card3.title: INTELLIGENT SECURITY PACK
card3.subtitle: Prevention, Protection, and Automated Response
card3.body: We combine the most powerful tools in the Microsoft ecosystem — Defender, Entra ID, and Azure Sentinel — with AI algorithms capable of detecting threats in real time.
card3.footer: Protect your data with intelligence, not reaction.

sofiaRamirez.role: Head of Analytics at Nova Group
